name: Maple Ridge Estates
description: Maple Ridge Estates is an exclusive collection of 14 custom-built colonial and transitional homes set on half-acre to one-acre lots in the prestigious Harrison school district. Each home features high-end finishes, open-concept floor plans, 3-car garages, and sweeping views of the Hudson Valley ridge.
features: Custom Kitchen with Sub-Zero & Wolf Appliances

seo.title: Maple Ridge Estates New Construction | Harrison NY | Pinnacle Realty Group
seo.description: New construction homes in Harrison NY from $1.85M. Custom colonials on half-acre lots, Harrison schools. Maple Ridge Estates by Silverstone Homes.
